name: THE Central Asia Universities Forum 2024 | Tashkent, Uzbekistan | 16 October
content: Join some of the region's most inspiring thought leaders and influential changemakers from higher education, policymaking and industry, as we focus on pressing issues and consider innovative solutions shaping the future of higher education in Central Asia. THE welcomes you to join us and share your expertise and experience as we delve into the following topics: - Young universities establishing themselves as esteemed institutions - Aligning curricula with labour market demands - The critical role of reputation in talent attraction and retention - New partnership models for new models of institution Ticketholders to the event will enjoy a variety of informative panel discussions, inspiring case study sessions, and an in-depth masterclass from THE's data team. The masterclass will feature detailed analysis and insight into the key findings, trends and stories from THE's rankings data. URL: Tickets: https://go.evvnt.com/2555562-1?pid=4868 Prices: Universities: UZS 200.00, Corporate: UZS 249.00 Category: Conferences | Education | Higher Education Date and Time: 16th October 2024 at 8:30 am to 6:30 pm Venue details: New Uzbekistan University, Movarounnahr Street 1, Tashkent, Uzbekistan
